content.rendered:
REDARC SMART START SBI 24V 200A

Redarc Smart Start SBI 24V 200A available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

The REDARC Smart Start® SBI224 is used in dual battery systems to protect the start battery from excessive discharge while the auxiliary battery is supplying non-essential loads. The SBI224 provides 24 volt DC incorporating 200A of continuous ratings. The 200A battery isolator is best suited for heavy-duty operations.

Power Saving Technology

The Smart Start SBI224 battery isolator is mostly used in commercial vehicle dual battery systems, it incorporates electronic components preventing the solenoid from generating high voltage transients. Used instead of a diode battery isolator due to reduce voltage drop associated with diode type isolation. It features sophisticated fault detection and LED indication of operation to warn the user of faults including over-voltage, voltage drop and excessive current draw conditions.

The Smart Start SBI224 battery isolator is a safe way to charge a heavy-duty dual battery systems and should often be installed with a high quality fuse kit.

Features

  • Overmould design
  • Compact in size and easy to install
  • Silver contacts for longer life and suitable for marine applications
  • Power saving technology
  • Fault indication
  • Fully surge protected
CLICK HERE to view the full range of products available for your 4×4!
Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
